document.full_text: the united states hit venezuelan state oil company pdvsa with sanctions on tuesday in a more aggressive bid to starve iran of fuel, prompting fury and warnings from venezuelan president hugo chavez's government.
document.title: u.s. sanctions venezuelan oil giant for iran trade
lines_and_colors: the united states hit venezuelan state oil company pdvsa with sanctions on tuesday in a more aggressive bid to starve iran of fuel, prompting fury and warnings from venezuelan president hugo chavez's government.
